data.title: Descendants of Rurik (A 1000 questions)
data.text:
Dear Mr. Agamov and Mr. Soshnikov:

I am descended from two of the daughters of

Yaroslav "the Great," Grand

Duke (Prince) of Kiev. However, I'm having a

difficult time sorting out

their ancestors. If either of you could assist

me in anyway, I would

greatly appreciate it. I have read parts of Mr.

Agamov's commentary with

regard to the Rurik line; however, I am still not

clear about the correct

line of descent. My line is as follows:

Anna (Agnes) Yaroslavna of Kiev and her sister

Agatha Yroslavna of Kiev (I

descend from both daughters.)

to

Yarolsav Vladimirovitch, Grand Duke of Kiev

who married

Iren (Ingegard) of Sweden

to

Vladimir "the Great," Grand Duke of Kiev

who married

Rogeneda (Ragnild) of Potolsk

to

Svatoslaf Igorivitch, Grand Duke of Kiev

who married

Matusja of Lubeck

to

Igor (Ingvarr) Rurikovitch, Grand Duke of Kiev

who married

Olga (Olegha) (Surname Unknown)

to

Rurik "the Viking or Dane," Grand Duke of

Novgorod

who married

Efenda (Edvina) (Surname Unknown)

Also, which title is correct "Grand Duke" or

Grand Prince?" I have seen

both in reference to the same people.

In closing, I am, with best regards,

Sincerely yours,

Bryan Scott Johnson, MA

Dear Brian,

This is an "official" otigin of Rurikids. Hope it'll help You.

Rurik I Pr. of Novgorod b. 830, 862, Pr. of Novgorod, m. Efanda (Inghrid=

?) of Urman. Rurik died

879. Pr. of Beloozero and Izborsk (864).

I. Igor I The Old Rurikovich Pr. of Kiev b. 875/869, m. 903, St. Olga Gr.=

Pr. of Kiev, b. 883,=20

945, Gr. Pr. of Kiev, d. 11.07. 969. Igor was killed 945.=20

A. Sviatoslav I Igorevich Pr. of Kiev b. .07. 942, 952, Pr. of

Kiev, m=

. (1) Predslava Of

Hungary(?), m. (2) Malusha. Sviatoslav, was killed 972

1. Jaropolk I Sviatoslavich Gr. Pr. of Kiev (son of

Sviatoslav I Igorev=

ich Pr. of Kiev and

Predslava Of Hungary(?)) b. 961, 972, Gr. Pr. of Kiev, m. ?, "of Greeks=

". Jaropolk was killed

980.

a. Sviatopolk I Jaropolchich Pr. of Kiev b. 980,

15.07.1015, Pr. of K=

iev, m. ab. 1013, ? Of

Polen, (daughter of Boleslav I king of Poland and Emnilde) d.bef. 14 Aug =

1018. Sviatopolk died

1019.

. of Kiev and Predslava Of

and Malusha) b. 951/948, 980, Pr. of Kiev, m. (1) Olova, "of Bohemia", =

90, Anna Of Greek, b.

13.03. 963, (daughter of Roman II Emp. of Byzantie and Pheofana (Anastasi=

e) d. 1012. Vladimir died

15.07.1015.

a. Vishislav Vladimirovich Pr. of Novgorod (son of

Vladimir I Sviatosl=

avich Pr. of Kiev and

lavich Pr. of Kiev and

(son of Vladimir I=

Sviatoslavich Pr. of Kiev

and Rogneda Rogvolodovna Prs. Of Polotzk) b. 989, 1016, Gr. Pr. of Kiev =

(bef 1018 and since 1019),

m. ab. 1016, St. Ingegard of Sweden, (daughter of Olaf III king of Sweden=

and Estrid of Slavonien)

d. 10.02.1050. Jaroslav died 20.02.1054.

(1) Ilia Jaroslavich Prs. Of Kiev b. aft

1016, d. 1020.

(2) Anastasia Jaroslavna Prs. Of Kiev b. aft

ovna Prs. Kiev) d. 1061.

(3) Vladimir Jaroslavich Pr. of Novgorod b.

rod, m. ab. 1038, Anna.=20

r. of Kiev, m. 1043,

3, Gr. Pr. of Kiev, m. (1)

r. of Kiev, m. (1) 1046,

b. 1034, 20.02.1054, Pr. =

of Smolensk, m. 1052, Oda

(Anna) ct. Of Schtadt, b. ab. 1028/29. Viacheslav died 1057.

(9) Igor Jaroslavich Pr. of

1045, Harald III king of No=

Norway, d. 1066. Elisabeth died 1065.

oslavich Pr. of Kiev and

(son of Boleslav II Hzg. Of Bohemy and Emma) d. 1037.

(son of Vladimir I=

-Volinsky, was killed

1016/15.

Vladimir I Sviatoslavi=

ch Pr. of Kiev and ?) b.

ab. 983, 994, Pr. of Murom;Pr. of Rostov (1010), was killed 24.07.1015.

Vladimir I Sviatoslavic=

h Pr. of Kiev and ?) b.

ab. 984, was killed 05.09.1015.

of Kiev (daughter of=

Pr. of Kiev) m. 1041, Casimir I Hzg. of Polen, b. 25.07.1016, 1039, Hzg.=

Of Polen, (son of Meshko

lavich Pr. of Kiev) Pr.

of Ovruch, was killed 1015

Vladimir I Sviatoslavic=

h Pr. of Kiev) 1036, Pr.

of Pskov (till 1059), d. 1063.

l. Stanislav Vladimirovich Pr. of Smolensk (son of

Vladimir I Sviatosl=

avich Pr. of Kiev).

m. Pozvizd Vladimirovich Prs. of Kiev (son of

Vladimir I Sviatoslavich=

Pr. of Kiev).

B. Gleb (Uleb) Igorevich Prs. of Kiev, was killed d. 971.
